mapper.select: select DISTINCT ra.id,ra.authority_code from rjb_authority ra INNER JOIN rjb_role_authority_rela rrar on rrar.authority_code = ra.authority_code INNER JOIN rjb_role rr on rr.id = rrar.role_id INNER JOIN rjb_user_role_rela rurr on rurr.role_id=rr.id INNER JOIN rjb_user ru on rurr.user_id=ru.id where ru.id=#{userId}
